column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: arrival. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix arrival: <http://www.example.org/arrival/> .arrival:ArrivalEvent    rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Arrival Event"@en ;    rdfs:comment "An event which denotes the arrival of something or someone."@en .arrival:hasArrivalTime    rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has arrival time"@en ;    rdfs:comment "The time at which the arrival took place."@en ;    rdfs:domain arrival:ArrivalEvent ;    rdfs:range xsd:dateTime .arrival:hasArrivalPlace    rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has arrival place"@en ;    rdfs:comment "The place at which the arrival took place."@en ;    rdfs:domain arrival:ArrivalEvent ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Resource .arrival:ArrivingEntity    rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Arriving Entity"@en ;    rdfs:comment "The entity that is arriving."@en .arrival:hasArrivingEntity    rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has arriving entity"@en ;    rdfs:comment "The entity that is identified as arriving at the event."@en ;    rdfs:domain arrival:ArrivalEvent ;    rdfs:range arrival:ArrivingEntity .```
